fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Strengthen your soul and weaken your body for the next phase. 4 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your soul is strong and body is weak during the day, and you are hanged, you will steal the body of the first person to vote for you.
- If your soul is strong and body is weak during the night, and you are killed, you will steal the body of a player who killed you, randomized if there are multiple.
- When stealing a player's body, you survive and they die, to themselves if at night. You clean them and become their *exact* role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Steal the body of another player, then complete that goal.
